thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: U.S. Treasury Bonds Weaken as Global Stocks Rally

author: Akane Otani
title: U.S. Treasury Bonds Weaken as Global Stocks Rally

organizations.name: u.s. treasury bonds weaken as global stocks rally u.s.

text:
U.S. government bond prices fell Monday, resuming a recent slide, as shares from Europe to Asia rebounded from a global stock rout.
The yield on the benchmark 10-year U.S. Treasury note was recently at 2.860%, according to Tradeweb, compared with 2.829% Friday. Yields rise as bond prices fall.
Government bonds have come under pressure in recent...
